fields.label: Default Access Token
fields.description: Meta WhatsApp Business API access token (can be overridden per number)

fields.label: Webhook Verify Token
fields.description: Token for webhook verification from Meta

fields.label: Webhook URL
fields.description: Use this URL in Meta App Settings

fields.label: Janus HTTP API URL
fields.description: HTTP endpoint for Janus API

fields.label: Janus WebSocket URL
fields.description: WebSocket endpoint for browser connections (use wss:// for production)

fields.label: Janus API Secret
fields.description: API secret from janus.jcfg

fields.label: NAT & WebRTC Configuration
fields.description: Production settings for NAT traversal and ICE connectivity (required for public deployment)

fields.label: Janus Public IP Address
fields.description: Public IP of your Janus server (required for nat_1_1_mapping in janus.jcfg). Leave empty for local development.

fields.label: ICE Servers Configuration (JSON)
fields.description: Custom ICE servers configuration in JSON format. If empty, uses STUN/TURN settings below.

fields.label: Enable STUN Server
fields.description: Use STUN server for NAT traversal (recommended for production)

fields.label: STUN Server
fields.description: STUN server hostname (Meta recommends Google's STUN server)

fields.label: STUN Port
fields.description: STUN server port (default: 19302)

fields.label: TURN Server Configuration (Optional)
fields.description: TURN server acts as a relay when direct peer connection fails

fields.label: Enable TURN Server
fields.description: Use TURN server as relay (required for strict firewalls/NAT)

fields.label: TURN Server
fields.description: TURN server hostname or IP

fields.label: TURN Port
fields.description: TURN server port (default: 3478)

fields.label: TURN Username
fields.description: Authentication username for TURN server

fields.label: TURN Credential
fields.description: Authentication password/credential for TURN server

fields.label: TURN Transport Protocol
fields.description: Transport protocol for TURN server

fields.label: Enable Call Recording
fields.description: Record all calls automatically

fields.label: Recording Storage Path
fields.description: Path relative to site directory

fields.label: Recording Format
fields.description: Audio format for recordings

fields.label: Recording Retention Days
fields.description: Delete recordings older than this (0 = keep forever)
